release.action: Enhance click(Object... expected) method to act intelligently as clickonly and click(expected) in Button, Link and Image.
select() in SelectList class doesnt take in the actual params being passed
Bluefin tests shows failure while running with Iphone/Android Driver.
Mechanism to set MAC version.
Fix Incorrect build information displayed in HTML reports.
Re-factor BluefinLogger to use SimpleLogger.

release.description: Harbour Release - LVS changes, Upgrade TestNG to 6.8, Selenium to 2.25.0. iPad support.
release.action: CSS selector support in Bluefin automation
Bluefin support for iPad.
Create a helper method to perform uploading of files for Grid Runs.
Upgrade TestNG dependency version to 6.8.
Upgrade Selenium version to 2.25.0.
Updated the Selenium host to LVS Host machine.
Fix console log.
Report test execution results into EZTracker when using @Factory.

release.description: Catamaran Release - Abstraction of TestNG Listeners, Optimize Session management and Timeouts for WebTest, bug fixes, code deprecation, refactoring and many more are part of this release.
release.action: BLUEFIN-173 - Optimize Session management and Timeouts for WebTests.
BLUEFIN-152 - Create a helper method to perform Uploading of files for remote runs.
BLUEFIN-153 - Leverage TestNG ServiceLoaders instead of Listeners in TestNG Suite File.
BLUEFIN-26 - Bluefin Maven Plug-in for Bluefin GUI Class generation.
BLUEFIN-149 - Bluefin Selenium enhancement - Please provide an option to pass http headers in Firefox browsers in grid/local.
BLUEFIN-167 - Cannot use new object's xPath in new inheritance page.
BLUEFIN-162 - Code cleanup - Remove deprecation.
BLUEFIN-179 - Sauce Lab - user defined additional configuration in desired capabilities.
BLUEFIN-159 - Failures in reports due to ssh passwordless issues.
BLUEFIN-166 - ExcelDataProvider does not work correctly with cell contains "#".
BLUEFIN-186 - GUIMapExcelDataProvider is not reading excel sheet with empty rows. Creating null pointer exception.

release.description: Cruise Ship Release - Maintainence release to improve the quality of the framework by revamping unit tests to execute on chrome browser and better reports. Also selenium server and Grid infrastructure is upgraded to 2.21.0. Other important stories include ability to connect to the Sauce labs grid and Integration of dynamic unit tests for Bluefin GUI.
release.action: Ability to specify understandable test-names for SauceLabs runs involving Data Driven tests.
Ability to specify understandable test-names for SauceLabs runs.
Ability to specify Bluefin Framework required Selenium Version for SauceLabs runs.
Ability to connect to Sauce Labs grid. New VM argument 'SELENIUM_USE_SAUCELAB_GRID' added in order to support this capability.
Selenium server and Grid infrastructure is upgraded to 2.21.0. Enhanced framework to adopt 2.21.0 introduced behaviors with Alerts.
Improved HTML reports for data driven test execution, which provides the test data for each iteration now in the report.
Improved HTML and Excel reports with more information about the execution environment like Stage name, Browser used, Build Id, Release, Stream name, DB version now in the report.
Integration of dynamic unit tests for Bluefin GUI. Going forward you will not be required to add unit tests for new page classes, and they will be dynamically created and executed.
Fixed unit tests to test chrome browser.
Revamp ExcelDataProvider unit test to include tests for all functionalities.
Bluefin Bug in getExcelRows when passing range.
Excel Data Provider throws runtime exception without much information when the excel file has blank rows / columns in it.
Excel Data provider throws null pointer exception when the sheet name and the incoming object name into which data is to be read into doesn't match.
Bluefin Reports doesn't use static filename. Use static filename for generated Bluefin report.
Race Condition In SeleniumCapabilities.onFinish() when involving parallel tests.

release.description: Wave Skimmer Release - Maintainence release to improve the quality of the framework by revamping unit tests to execute on multiple browsers and adding more unit tests, architectural redesign of appscan, datamanager, Grid , Webdriver factory and package redesign. Also all GUI Map Data files are now in YAML format. Apart from lot of code clean up and deprecation, selenium server is upgraded to 2.15.0, and improved Bluefin Logger.
release.action: Converted all GUI Map Data XLS files to YAML.
YAML support in Bluefin Navigator
Redesign package structure.
Redesign Grid and WebDriverFactory.

Datamanager Redesign. Changed the DataProvider implementation so that it will not create 2 instance of DataProvider to do one read operation. With this we can do multiple read operation with same instance of DataProvider without connecting several times.

Appscan Redesign. Included State management so that framework can control invalid appscan action from a specific appscan state. Included Session management so that more than one appscan testcase can run in parallel without crashing the appscan proxy. Linked with WebSession concept, so that appscan can be used with WebSession. Included unit test for appScan.
Improved Bluefin logger with different application logging levels(FINE, FINER, INFO, WARN, SEVERE).

Enhance Bluefin framework such that it can associate itself to an already running iPhone simulator via the locally spawned Grid and provide the users to leverage the framework and work with iPhone as well.
Unit Tests revamp, clean up and tests for multiple browsers.
Enhanced javadocs.
Enhanced maven project site.
Convert old page classes in Bluefin GUI to new page architecture.
API to retrieve list of rlog ids and correlation ids per test case basis.
Add sample in archetype for using sessionName, openNewSession, keepSessionOpen parameters in @WebTest annotation. Added sample YAML GUI Map Data Files in archetype.
Remove deprecated classes GuiMapExcelDataProviderException, ECase, IECertOverride, ChangeCDBValue. Remove deprecated methods in GenesisUtility.
Deprecate ScreenCapture, Globals, FileOperationStatus, EscapeHelper.
Bug 475 - For local runs when the user specified JSON file is invalid, proper intimation not given to user.
Bug 490 - Local runs causes errors when working with 2.12 selenium libraries.
Bug 517 - Handle UTF8 char-set in YAML DataProvider.
Bug - Handle Name and ID Locator for HTML Tables.
Added 20 IE driver nodes to Grid.

release.description: Trimaran Release - Selenium 2 Grid Integration, Named Sessions for WebTest Annotations to allow multiple tests within the same class share a browser instance, YAML Support for DataProvider, Logging capabilities for GUI operations, Excel to YAML GUI Map Data Converter, STF and ePAL to Bluefin code in Bluefin Navigator and other various bug fixes/improvements.
release.action: Integration of Selenium2 a.k.a Web driver capabilities into Bluefin framework. Support Local runs by spawning Grid2. Support Remote runs in Grid2. Support for Firefox 5.0,6.0, Google chrome and IE latest version. HTMLUnit Web driver support. Android Support. Selenium 2 Grid machine. Re-factor Appscan implementation with Web driver.
Support for named sessions via the WebTest annotation.
Bluefin Data provider is now redesigned to support YAML and Excel GUI Map Data File.
Sample tests in the archetype are refactored to use selenium2/web driver.
X2YConverter - Excel to YAML GUI Map Data Converter.
Excel Data Provider enhancements - You can now choose the list of data from the excel sheet to be used for your data driven tests.
Logging capabilities for GUI operations.
Unit Tests for Bluefin HTML elements.
A new version of Bluefin Navigator with ePal Navigator.
Bug 345: Getting error "Session ID may not be null" when working with html elements of Selenium.
Bug 402: Disable Webdriver warning messages in the console.
Bug : loadObjectMap cannot read .xlsx Excel data workbooks.
Bug 304 / 305 - generateBankDetails method in Genesis utility doesn't return correct bank account for certain countries.
Bug 403 - getFindElementType() method of AbstractElement class fails when there are untrimmed spaces.
Bug - Add link to the screen shots from Excel reporter.
Bug 437 - Bluefin SelectList function getSelectOptions does not return the list of item in a select list.
Bug 441 - type() does not clear the text field before entering text.
Bug 442 - BasePageImpl should directly support driver()
Bug 443 - In AbstractElement, isElementPresent does not handle exception and fails.
Bug 444 - SelectList should provide method to deselect all items.
Bug 445 - SelectList should have a method to deselect an item.
Bug 451 - Grid.open/Grid.driver().get()/Grid.selenium().open() throws a NullPointer Exception.
Bug 433 - Duplicate entries of Listeners in properties in pom.xml and SampleSuite.xml

release.description: Emergency patch for Bluefin in order to adjust for the switch to a new API location for Genesis,QI,CAL,eZTracker web services.
release.action: Fix issue with the EZTracker Reporting service client stub generation part since web services are moved to https.

release.description: Felucca Release - More enhancements to Bluefin framework like Excel Reporter, CAL Report link for actions involving Correlation ID in Bluefin reports, enhanced archetype to test ASF services. New artifacts like Bluefin BAT, JawsVOXValueObjects, STF Navigator.
release.action: Support in archetype to test ASF service calls.
Excel Reporter - Bluefin can generate test execution result in Excel format as well, apart from the default HTML Report.
Enhanced Bluefin reports with CAL Report link for actions involving Correlation ID.
A new version of Bluefin Navigator with STF Navigator.
Bluefin BAT test cases.
Bug 176 - AppScanHelper.abortScan() fails when a Test method is skipped.
Bug 190 - CreditCardType enum for MasterCard is wrong.
Bug 129 - BFReporter displays wrong numbers in Passed and Failed field while update eZTracker.
Bug 248 - WebReporter.log and Reporter.log are not working with 68-SNAPSHOT.
Bug 244 - eZTracker status is not getting updated for data driven Test Cases.
Bug - Remove MethodListener in BFReporter.

release.description: Schooner Release - Enhanced archetype to test API calls and restructured folder structure, Appscan integration, enhanced Bluefin asserts, revamped Genesis utilities, Grid support for firefox-iPhone,removed deprecated methods in Bluefin-Utils and isolated eZTracker reporting from BFReporter.
release.action: Enhanced Bluefin Archetype to support testing API calls and using GUIData from within the project.
AppScan integration into Bluefin framework.
Enhance Bluefin asserts to log soft asserts that passed in the Bluefin Reports.
Revamped Genesis Utilities, supports more methods provided by Genesis web service and also provides user friendly error handling.
Grid support for firefox-iPhone.
Handle XHR error in Bluefin frame work. Now firefox in the Grid will remember the certificates which are taken care by the framework.
Added Click() and Click(Object...) method for HtmlImage.
Enable logging of RC IP.
Isolate EZTracker reporting from BFReporter.
Removed the “How to” section in our Bluefin-Core site gen section.
Removed deprecated methods in Bluefin-Utils.
Bug - Incorrect VM Args -DBLUEFIN_USE_LOCAL_RC usage in Bluefin-Archetype (v0.0.5r3).

release.description: Hovercraft Release - Re-architected framework to support extension of page declaration classes and HTML Object initialization. Also introduced new features like Soft Assert capabilities, eZTracker reporting service integration. Support for Firefox 3.6 and IE7.0 local runs. New tools like GUI Class Generator Eclipse plugin and Bluefin Startup Kit. Introduced new Bluefin project portal.
release.action: Bluefin GUI Class Extendibility - Re-engineered framework to support extension of page declaration classes. Users can now inherit an existing page and creates new page declarations. Also included, lazy loading to initialize the HTML objects in each page.
Automatic Html Object initialization in Bluefin Page Creation - Created a methodology to dynamically initialize all the HTML elements, member variables in a page.
Soft Assert capabilities. Soft Asserts are now decoupled to work as an independent listener.
EZTracker reporting service integration, which brings capabilities to report your test execution results to eZTracker.
Support for Firefox 3.6 and Internet Explorer 7.0 for local runs.
Port Bluefin-Utils functionalities into Jaws and deprecated Bluefin-utils.
Bluefin GUI Code Generator, an eclipse plug-in which is used to create .java file ( for Bluefin GUI pages) from the excel sheet.
Bluefin Startup Kit
Introducing Bluefin portal (http://bluefin)

release.description: Dredger Release - In addition to an expanding Page declaration library, highlights include: We have been investigating Selenium WebDriver and how it may plug into the Bluefin environment. WebDriver has huge potential in terms of testing on browsers and internet devices.More enhancements, refinements, documentation and bug fixes.
release.action: Investigation on Web driver, reporting service integration, multiple profile support, mobile testing and documentation.
Enable local execution on IE browser.
@WebTest support for all @Before and @After configuration annotations.
More Documentation.

release.description: Tugboat Release - In addition to an expanding Page declaration library, highlights include: Screen Capture for IE Browser, Calendar Widget (to select a date using the UI), Bluefin-Core Javadocs, Stabilizing the Grid environment
release.action: Add RCs to Grid and stabilize grid.
Bluefin Core clean up.
Create Global constants.
Screen capture for IE.
Added Javadocs to bluefin core.
Calendar Widget (to select a date using the UI).

release.description: Ferry Release - In addition to an expanding Page declaration library, support for Internet explorer 7, support for Data driven test cases, Genesis Utilities and Grid enhancements.
release.action: IE7 Support.
Data driven test cases support.
Genesis Utilities.
Grid enhancements.
Reports: Remove dependency on external machine
Initial framework, Jaws Encapsulation, Selenium Grid setup and finalized package / folder structure .
